alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:24PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lemhi County through 345 PM MDT... At 324 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of North Fork, or 9 miles north of Salmon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salmon, North Fork, Gibbonsville and Carmen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
